title: How to Easily Defeat the Last Boss on Resident Evil 4 Alternative

steps.headline: Begin the final boss fight with Osmund Saddler.
steps.description: Press the "Dodge" button when prompted during his attacks; it will give you a split second to hit the correct button and get out of the way unscathed

steps.headline: Shoot the eyes located on his legs.
steps.description: When he is stunned from a shot to one of these eyes, run up to him and press the button prompted, to climb onto him and stab his main eyeball

steps.headline: Shoot the explosive barrels positioned around the area whenever Saddler is near them, as this stuns him and causes him damage.
steps.description: Climb onto the walkway at either end, and press the switch when he is close, to cause the scaffolding to crash onto him

steps.headline: Continue mixing the attacks in Steps 2 and 3.
steps.description: Wait for Ada to throw you a rocket launcher after you have hurt Saddler badly enough; she will throw it automatically when that threshold has been reached

steps.headline: Pick up the rocket launcher and equip it.
steps.description: Wait for Saddler to approach you, and shoot him with the rocket launcher once to defeat him
